text: Mariusz Luncik (born 1 May 1971) is a retired Polish football goalkeeper.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:GKS Katowice players Category:GKS Tychy players Category:GKS Bełchatów players Category:Wuppertaler SV players Category:Lech Poznań players Category:Kujawiak Włocławek players Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:Polish expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Polish expatriate sportspeople in Germany
title: Mariusz Luncik
